name: HoneyGoat
description:
A bunch of bees stole a goat because they want their honey back. 

Save the goat.

Press Space to start

Tap to kill the bees ,

move left and right with arrow keys

Get to zero and You Win!

I think it is obvious I made all the assets so I credit myself. 

Just picking Flame up bit by bit. I 'm just here to see if I can finish something and challenge myself. Hopefully improve my Flame skills , code and make something better in the future.

Maybe it is my browser but can't get it to play.  

https://github.com/LR369/HoneyGoat
